channel.title: Making a perfect ring or dark dagger strong?
channel.description: On some servers I have been an administrator on, I have noticed that either a dark dagger or a perfect ring had REALLY strong equiptable stats... How can I make my dark daggers or perfect rings like those, and you have to have playerrights = 2 or playerrights = 3 or playerrights = 4?

item.title: Making a perfect ring or dark dagger strong?
item.dc:creator: @_Java2 ~Java~
item.source: Making a perfect ring or dark dagger strong?

item.title: Making a perfect ring or dark dagger strong?
item.dc:creator: @pies pies
item.description:
@pies wrote:

You can change how powerful a weapon is in item.CGF

It’s the last 10 numbers, change them to something like 10000 (Ten thousand)

Not sure how to make it so only people with certain playerRights can use them though, sorry

Read full topic
item.source: Making a perfect ring or dark dagger strong?
